page.title: 01Landscape in Bristol
page.content: Our block is made up of many beautiful structures and places. The nearest to us is the {Bristol Docks}which stretch a fair distance and its polluted waters take us up to the{Centre of {Bristol}where the statue of {Neptune,} the Greek god of the sea, looks over the streets of the Centre. The Docks house the {S.S. Great Britain.} If you stroll up through the Centre and go up a hill into Clifton, you come to the { {Bristol Museum}which shows off its large Egyptian display. Quite far from here you come to the top of Clifton and the {Clifton Downs}which stretch for a couple of miles. Across the road is {Bristol Zoo}which also has beautiful flower displays. Nearby is the {Bristol Suspension Bridge} climbing over the muddy water of the { {River Avon.}
